addonManifest.name: Altibase
addonManifest.description: Altibase provides in-memory and hybrid database solutions which increase performance at a fraction of the cost of traditional enterprise datbases.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This addon provides Database Schema as a Service (DSaaS), as its architecture is similar to Oracle's.
addonManifest.developerHelp: Specify the schema name you wish to create. Apprenda will create the schema and then provide your applicaiton with a connection string to use.
